comment._content: Kornmarkt in Heidelberg - Then and Now - 100+ years later "Kornmarkt in Heidelberg - 2009" by Hotel am Kormarkt "Kornmarkt in Heidelberg - 1881" by Carl Curman

comment.author: 54957177@N08
comment._content: I have a print of the heidelberg kornmarket similar to the one above.  Mine has two wagons with horses and a man taking a picture facing the castle.  In the lower left corner of the print  " Verlag von Reu Eshuster Berlin" is printed.  This print was purchased in Heidelberg but no date is given.    Does anyone know anythng about this print?  Thanks for any information.   David  M.
